original_text: Gate of the city, weep! City, cry out in pain! You Philistine people should be very afraid! See that cloud of smoke in the north! It is the dust of an army that is marching towards you. Their soldiers are ready to fight, and none of them is afraid. 14: The gate in a city was the place where important people met. So the word ‘gate’ here may mean those important people. Gate of the city, weep! City, cry out in pain! You Philistine people should be very afraid! See that cloud of smoke in the north! It is the dust of an army that is marching towards you. Their soldiers are ready to fight, and none of them is afraid. 14: The gate in a city was the place where important people met. So the word ‘gate’ here may mean those important people. Gate of the city, weep! City, cry out in pain! You Philistine people should be very afraid! See that cloud of smoke in the north! It is the dust of an army that is marching towards you. Their soldiers are ready to fight, and none of them is afraid. 14: The gate in a city was the place where important people met. So the word ‘gate’ here may mean those important people. Gate of the city, weep! City, cry out in pain! You Philistine people should be very afraid! See that cloud of smoke in the north! It is the dust of an army that is marching towards you. Their soldiers are ready to fight, and none of them is afraid.
korean_text: 성문이여 슬피 울지어다 성읍이여 부르짖을지어다 너 블레셋이여 다 소멸되리로다 대저 연기가 북방에서 오는데 그 대열에서 벗어난 자가 없느니라

sentences.original_text: You Philistine people should be very afraid!
sentences.korean_translation: 너 블레셋 사람들은 매우 두려워해야 한다!

sentences.original_text: See that cloud of smoke in the north!
It is the dust of an army
Their soldiers are ready to fight,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 군사들은 싸울 준비가 되어 있고

sentences.original_text: and none of them is afraid.
The gate in a city was the place

sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 '문'이라는 말은 여기서 의미할 수 있다
